Review.Titre: I felt like more money should be given…
Review.Contenu: I felt like more money should be given for the phone just $5 is a scam will not recommend this company for trading phones
After I was sent the email confirming my request, the order remained pending. I was never sent information about how to complete the transaction, neither via email nor by logging in to the account .

Review.Titre: I sold my used motorola to these guys…
Review.Contenu: I sold my used motorola to these guys on 7/22 and shipped it out the next day.  The item was received on 7/26.  So far I haven't gotten no emails or response saying they have received my item or they are processing my payment.  Nada... I'm starting to think maybe they are not that legitimate and trying to be reaping people off online? 🤔🤔🤔

Review.Titre: There was not clear specifications on…
Review.Contenu: There was not clear specifications on the quote that a phone that did not meet their review would receive no money.  So they got a free phone - although they did pay shipping.

Review.Titre: I never received an email with a label…
Review.Contenu: I never received an email with a label to mail my phone into you guys🙄

Review.Titre: I have not received the check for my…
Review.Contenu: I have not received the check for my phone yet and it’s been over 5 business days

Review.Titre: It took weeks to process everything…
Review.Contenu: It took weeks to process everything after the phone showed delivered. I ended up having to email and call several time. Finally they provided an amount which was different. They said the phone was not used even though it had not been used. I would have preferred the phone be shipped back, but they were so hard to work with, I was concerned it would get lost or delayed. Some money is better than none. But, I would not work with them again.

Total scam. Sent my phone in and was told not in the condition I sent it in. Then after I agreed to their lesser amount and wrote a bad review on Google, now they won’t send me check for lesser amount or my phone back. It’s January 15 and they got my phone on Dec. 8. Again, total scam of a company.

Well now February 14, 2020 and I sent my phone in on December 6, 2019. Still have yet to receive my $26 from Techpayout. To bad when companies post their own reviews on these sites to try to make themselves look honest. This company is nothing but garbage. Don’t waste your time.

Review.Titre: Well at first I was very untrusting …
Review.Contenu: Well at first I was very untrusting because of all the scams out there it was very stressful  at first until I got the check and it did not bounce, even though I  feel my phone was worth more than what I got this is an honest trust worthy company.
I sent in my 2 phones with box and label provided by the company. We dropped off the box at our local UPS store where it was scanned. As of today we are yet to receive the check in the mail.

So this "company" have so many reviews on Trustpilot, but that's all, very suspicious... Nowhere else you can find any more reviews at this level... Beware of all the fake 5 star reviews here.I was ready to send my device, when I explained the reasons because of why I couldn't erase the content on my phone, and I told "them" that they could do a hard reset on my device once "they" had it."They" replied to my email asking me for my phone passcode and my google email password. Are you serious? Who would ask for something like that?So basically "these guys" (probably just one person who replied to me from his mom's basement) wanted access to my whole life...You don't even need any passcode or passwords to hard reset an android device, so the only intention to ask me was just criminal.If there's a reply to this bad review, or not, do not trust this "company", I have saved the email, and there's nothing "they" can do about it.A total scam, truly criminal. Only a criminal would ask for your phone passcode and google account password.
I'm still trying to contact them about a check for $180 that I never received..  Can someone please contact me.

Review.Titre: I have yet to receive the payment for…
Review.Contenu: I have yet to receive the payment for my phone!

Review.Titre: Would never use this company again
I have not received my check yet
Review.Contenu: Too long of a process to get paid
Not a positive experience with TechPayout. Stated my cell phone was indeed not as identified for a payout. Will not use again!

Review.Titre: PayPal froze transaction saying techpayout is a questionable company.
Review.Contenu: I received my money for my trade in, techpayout transfered funds into my PayPal account and now my account is frozen with funds on hold for 21 days because techpayout is considered by PayPal to be shady and or a questionable company or their methods using PayPal is concerning.
I shipped my phone out on Aug 16th and have not received payment yet. Today is Aug 24th. Waiting for someone to get back to me.

Review.Titre: Quick to recieve, slow to pay
Review.Contenu: Everything went well up until the important part of receiving the payment. You received the phone, but i am told the check is in the mail; after 7 business days, not the 5 quoted, I still have not received payment.Now I need to go through the added trouble of dealing with customer service to receive what was promised.   Not a great way of promoting future business.

Review.Titre: It's been 7 business days and I still…
Review.Contenu: It's been 7 business days and I still have not received my check, I was told it would be in my possession in 5 business days. Finally received my check and was told it is due to USPS delays.
nothing to say
This service is slow.  It took several days to hear from them, and now I printed a UPS label and sent in my merchandise and still haven't heard anything from them.
The service was alright. I may not have gotten the amount that I wanted for my item but the company worked well with me and gave what they could.

Review.Titre: quick on paying for phones that were…
Review.Contenu: quick on paying for phones that were sold to them, but do not respond to requests for phone values

Review.Titre: I didn't receive and initial mailing…
Review.Contenu: I didn't receive and initial mailing label at first. I then was contacted by a customer representative and received the label within minutes.

Review.Titre: I am happy with the way the transaction…
Review.Contenu: I am happy with the way the transaction was handled. Fair pricing, expedient service, however, more payout options would be nice. When I had a question, drop them an email and got an answer much quicker than I had expected.

The quote for the payout was competitive.  Printing the shipping label was easy.  The response obtained when the shipment was received by TechPayout was very quick.  I have not yet received the payment which is coming by mail.  When the payment is received and clears my bank, it will be a 5 star rating.

Review.Titre: It was fast and great experience
Review.Contenu: It was fast and great experience. Good customer and team work. Only 4 stars cause I was expected to get more money!

Review.Titre: They really helped in buying my product…
Review.Contenu: They really helped in buying my product and were very thorough. My only complaint is the items is brand new and just purchased and I received less than 20% of the cost.
Everything was great . My only issue may have been my mistake of not knowing that PayPal takes a cut. They were honest and quick.thank you
Very professional and abides by payment that was agreed upon. I would use them again.

Review.Titre: First time using the service, but probably not the last
Review.Contenu: Although I had issues with the website (the contact page was giving a 404 error at the time) that were a little off-putting, I was able to contact them by phone, send in my device using the supplied label, and received a check in the mail promptly. Much easier than eBay or craigslist, an ideal service for people that are willing to maybe take a little less for their device in exchange for a really easy to use, no hassle/haggle service.

Honest company - the only reason I have them 4 stars because depending on where you live if you accept the check option it takes 5 days to arrive and 5 days for your device to arrive at there facility so you are looking around 10 days for the transaction to be complete other than that you can send your phone and they will pay you as they say they will PayPal is faster if you go that route... great company

Overall, the process was easy to do. The only area where I would suggest improvement is the payout process. There should be some sort of notification of when you can expect your check in the mail. But, even then when I reached out, they were prompt about finding the information to answer my question and therefore relieving my concern of not being paid as discussed. Great transaction! I'll be sure to use them again if I need to be rid of some old electronics!

Review.Titre: Easy to see what price you will receive…
Review.Contenu: Easy to see what price you will receive for selling item. Whole process from getting quote to mailing phone to receiving check took less than 2 weeks. Cons: Would be nice to get a box with prepaid label for shipping like some other companies send.Price seemed on the low side.

Review.Titre: Fenix 3 sapphire with all possible accessories $195
Review.Contenu: I provided a Fenix 3 sapphire with all UK/EU, travel outlet adaptors PLUS a metal band in addition to the HR monitor, and a rubber wrist band for the watch. They gave $195; one could consider to sell the individual units in the travel charger, metal band, watch with USB charger, regular rubber wrist brand.

Review.Titre: Vendor sent check for agreed amount
Review.Contenu: Lets see i sent my phone in and received payment for agreed upon amount 2 weeks later.  Initially put upa review saying had not received payment and vendor called my home to tell me check was in the mail.  I ddid appreciate the call as it showed they were a sincere firm

I have used TechPayout a couple of times and I have had no issues at all.  Some confusion when I inquired about a feature on the iPhone whether it was unlocked, I was given the wrong information.  Other than that, no issues at all with using TechPayout.

Once they receive the headphones, they are great about negotiating a fair price over email. If you use PayPal there is a fee, so I recommend a check or building the PayPal fee into your requested price.

I gave TechPayout a four star rating because the process was easy. Before deciding with them, I combed the internet looking for and comparing companies and the amount of money I would receive for my phone. I would have given them a five star had the payout been a little more. My phone was in excellent condition because I had just replaced it. So for that reason alone, I would have preferred at least ten more dollars. I waited to write here until I received my payment. I was impressed that within days of TechPayout receiving my phone I received the check int the mail. I also checked the company out on the BBB and they had a good rating.. YES, I would recommend them to any and everyone!

Review.Titre: I was disappointed in the amount of the…
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed in the amount of the payout, but it was better than nothing. The fact that US Cellular is my provider cost me $25 which I don't understand.
Service was easy to use. I made a mistake on the type of headphones I sent back and they gave me $5 more than they were worth. I appreciated that!
Wished I could have gotten more money for the sale of my Fitbit, but TechPayout’s service was very good. Will use them again!

Review.Titre: Not bad it was lower than I wanted but…
Review.Contenu: Not bad it was lower than I wanted but I had no use for the phone, they were quick paying me and quick in response.
Received check in a couple of days after submitting tablets. No dispute about condition of equipment. Honest company.

Review.Titre: Haven't received my payment yet but…
Review.Contenu: Haven't received my payment yet but this seems to be one of the best websites for selling your devices.
Prices offered were fair, and transaction smooth. Took a bit longer than anticipated to receive payment however.
Trustworthy company.  Received my pmt within 6 hours of them receiving my phone.  I would definitely use again

Review.Titre: They gave what my phone was worth and …
Review.Contenu: They gave what my phone was worth and they delivered it fast and they don’t cheat you out

Review.Titre: First time but seems to be good honest…
Review.Contenu: First time but seems to be good honest company would recommend and simple transaction.
The payment on the recycled phone was very prompt, if a bit low....  Thanks
Box was a little slow arriving. Check came much faster, and didn't bounce.
Easy and Simple process. Payment was super fast! Would definitely use again!
I'm satisfied with my experience.  I received the quoted price.
Straight shooters, good company, will use again

Review.Titre: Service was good, i would recommend
Review.Contenu: Service was good, i would recommend to others.

Review.Titre: I have no problems everything was good

Review.Contenu: Great pricing and quick response time.
Sold three items and was paid quickly.
Everything went smooth.  Sent my phones in and had the money in my account two days after they received them.  Would recommend them as a top choice for sellimg your phones.

TechPayout gave me the highest offer of all of the other buyback websites, so that was obviously a huge win. They also paid for shipping and paid me out the same day they got my phone (possibly next day..can't remember). I've never sold a phone online so I was definitely afraid of getting scammed but thankfully everything worked out. They're legit. Zero complaints

Update: Despite my initial concerns, I changed my review to reflect my current degree of satisfaction. I have received good customer service since expressing the initial concerns below.Earlier: I never received a response to a query about my order. I'm still waiting for a response about the item I sent in to sell, more than 2 weeks ago. And there's no update on the website. I will update this review if my transaction is completed, but as of now they have my tech and I have nothing.

Review.Titre: Finally got rid of my old tablet!
Review.Contenu: I looked at tech buyback companies to get rid of my giant, outdated Samsung Galaxy View tablet.  There were several sites that offered more money up front but, in doing research, TechPayout was the only one without complaints online.  In fact, several forums pointed at TechPayout as reputable, so I went with them.  Sure enough, shipping my tablet was easy, communication from them during the process was great, and I got my money (full amount offered) quickly.  Thank you!

Really impressed with their service! Recieved the full amount on Monday when it arrived to them just before the weekend. Other sites often come up with excuses as to why they can't give you the full amount, but this one is honest. Also, not sure if it was a coincidence, but I messaged them on monday asking if it would be processed that day since I needed to pay for something soon and within hours of asking I recieved the money :) will likely do business with them again!

Review.Titre: The check came in the mail in the…
Review.Contenu: The check came in the mail in the amount advertised and I didn’t have to go through the trouble of selling it my self. Now I don’t have an extra piece of electronics laying around the house collecting dust and two years ago the amount would have just about filled my gas tank.

Was honestly sceptical at first because I have never heard of them and they were claiming to pay much more than anyone else for pretty obscure devices.  Shipped out my two devices on a Friday and received my payment via PayPal on Thursday of the following week.  Great experience, will be using them for all future trade-ins.

Review.Titre: Tech payout is a great company they will do Yu good Yu will be 100% satisfied guarantee
Review.Contenu: Tech payout is a great company if Yu need something quoted they r on it quickly I am 100% satisfied with tech payout they definitely did me good I will be doin more business with tech payout thanks tech payout for everything even responding back quickly everytime I messaged...don't be scared to do business with tech payout they will do Yu good guarantee Yu walk away 100% satisfied

I was very impressed with the speed and price received for my device.  Website is very easy to navigate and I felt the price I was quoted was reasonable.  As soon as my device was received, my payment was immediately available in my PayPal account.  My only minor gripe is that I was charged a 3% fee for using PayPal, as opposed to no fee for a written check (which in these times thanks to a dysfunctional USPS, would probably not arrive for at least a week, if it arrives at all)

TechPayout is one of the better options to sell your used tech to. They make the process easy and pay very quickly. I believe selling items yourself to individuals may get you more money, but I like the hassle free option of mailing it to the buyer at a pre-negotiated price.

Have now sold a Garmin watch, AirPods, and an iPad to techpayout. Only issue with any of the three transactions was that one of the checks got delayed in the mail on its way to me. When I emailed customer service about it they responded within 30 minutes and immediately offered to cancel the original check and issue a new one. That’s better customer service than I would expect from even Amazon. For those skeptical about why they are only reviewed on trust pilot, seems to be because they send a link to the site to review your transaction. They promise to immediately publish all reviews: good, bad, or otherwise. In short, would recommend without reservation.

The estimate I got was the amount I was paid (my phone was exactly in the condition as I specified).The evaluation was fast. It didn't take as long as I thought.I opted for a check payment and the check was mailed the next day after evaluation completed. I received my check in Chicago in 6 days total (less than 5 business days). A very upfront transaction with no surprises. I will definitely deal with these folks in future. Great job!

Ease of transaction.  My device was reviewed immediately after being received and approved for the full amount.  What is really great is that the process provides status during each step.  I selected to be paid by check and with a week after receipt of my iPad the check came.

Excellent Masks, Excellent Service, The whole transaction was perfect.  High quality products were received from my orders.  Packaging was excellent and gave me confidence in the products. And they were as described.  Shipped quickly as well.

I've used TechPayout a few times now and each time my item was processed quickly and I received the expected payment immediately upon the completion of their review.  I've received exactly what I expected and haven't had any issues.  Recommended, especially for items that some other sites don't take, like watches and more obscure tech.

This is my second transaction with TechPayout. Another smooth transaction that was/is EXACTLY as advertised. I have another phone that I will sell to them.They are fair, upfront, and pay what they say for a device in accurately stated condition.Best recommendation: I would have my friends deal with TechPayout with NO reservations!

Review.Titre: Fast, Fair, Honest - Would Use Again
Review.Contenu: Great company with excellent service. A fast and easy way to re-home my tech-gear and get a little cash on top. The price offered was more than fair (especially with free shipping) and the payment was prompt. This was so much easier than trying to sell the stuff online myself. Thank you TechPayout! It was a pleasure dealing with you.

Review.Titre: Was offered a very fair price for my…
Review.Contenu: Was offered a very fair price for my Motorola G6. Expected an e-mail telling me something was wrong with it, screen was scratched, etc, and that they could not honor their initial offer and try to low ball me. It has happened to me before with a different company. Pleasantly surprised to get an e-mail telling me everything was fine and getting paid the same day. Very pleased, I'll certainly try to use them again.

Review.Titre: The process of selling my phone to…
Review.Contenu: The process of selling my phone to TechPayout was pretty easy and painless. Not wanting to incur any transfer fees from PayPal, I chose to receive my payment in the form of a check. The website mentioned that it would take 5 business days to receive the check. I was a little concerned when I check the mailbox on business day 5 and it wasn't there. However it was in my mailbox the very next day. I would highly recommend these folks and will likely use them again next time I have a phone to sell.

I was a bit skeptical when I began this process but it worked out exactly as they promised.  I traded a Garmin Dive Watch, they approved the condition and a check arrived right on time.  I will defininetly use them again.

Review.Titre: I was paid the amount quoted without…
Review.Contenu: I was paid the amount quoted without hassle and within the stated time period. I would do business with them again. Also they pay more than their competitors do. I'm satisfied with my transaction.

Review.Titre: I sold my used motorola to these guys…
Review.Contenu: I sold my used motorola to these guys on 7/22 and shipped it out the next day. The item was received on 7/26. So far I haven't gotten no emails or response saying they have received my item or they are processing my payment. Nada... I'm starting to think maybe they are not that legitimate and trying to be reaping people off online? 🤔🤔🤔*** Let me start by saying my previous review for TechPayout was not correct.  To clear things up, I just received the check from them today.  It did took longer than was expected for the check to come by postal mail.  However, it was for the same amount exactly as stated by Evan.  Evan have been a great source of comfort and contact from TP.  He was professional and helpful thru out the whole process.  I will definitely deal with them again!!! Highly recommended guys!!!

Review.Titre: Great job from start to finish
Review.Contenu: Great job from start to finish. We had over 200 phones to turn in and 2 separate orders. Evan helped us through the whole process with exceptional professionalism.

Fantastic experience. Was skeptical to send my phone out because of all the scams out there, but they were 100% legitimate. Sent my phone, printed the label, shipped it, and got paid nice and quick. A+

Review.Titre: Working with TechPayout was a great…
Review.Contenu: Working with TechPayout was a great experience. From the time I submitted my request, I was contacted to confirm my sale, sent the necessary labels, received word when my packages arrived, reviewed everything I sent it, and finally closed by sale. I would strongly recommend TechPayout and will go to them for my next order.

I had a VR headset that wasn't compatible with the games my son wanted to play so I searched for websites that bought used electronics. This website popped up and it is so easy to use. I told them what I had, they made me an offer and sent me the packing slip. I didn't have to pay to ship it to them and they sent my payment right away. Easiest money I've ever made. Thanks TechPayout!

Review.Titre: Well I haven’t received check yet
Review.Contenu: Well I haven’t received check yet. Still too early.  But the experience has been great. They emailed me quick.  Great communication

Techpayout took awhile to tell me about the status of my phone trade in, but when I inquired about it customer service they got back to me within 8 hours. I received and cashed in my check with no hassles. They offered me the best deal for my iPhone XR. I haven’t had any security issues either. I will use this company for future phone trade ins.

I obtained a quote to sell my second cellphone that is no longer being used.  I received the payment for the first cellphone that I sent to TechPayout.  Although the payment for the first cellphone took a couple of days more than it should have, that was entirely the result of the US mail system.  After I received the payment for the first cellphone, I obtained a quote for the second cellphone and dropped the package off at the local UPS store.  Three days later I received an email from TechPayout saying that the second cellphone had been received and was accepted with no changes to the quote, which was the same result I received with the first cellphone.  I expect I will receive the payment for the second cellphone sometime next week.  Everything worked as expected and I am totally satisfied with the experience.  Highly recommended!

Easy to identify from the website the expected proceeds from the phone sale.  Mailing label created and printed.  TechPayout sent emails along the way to communicate receipt, acceptance, and mailing of check.
I truly love these guys always fast and responsive going the extra mile. Customer Service is always 100% on point you can never go wrong with Tech Payout

Review.Titre: They are an excellent company when it…
Review.Contenu: They are an excellent company when it comes to selling products with them and continue to keep up the great work and I will always be a customer to them...Thank you all so much for the experience.

Review.Titre: When no one else would take my device…
Review.Contenu: When no one else would take my device in trade in, you guys stepped up and I appreciate making the process easy.
TechPayout offered me a very competitive price for my phone. I boxed it up, sent it with the shipping label that they provided, and quickly received my check. This was a smooth, easy transaction.
Truly happy with their service! It was fast, clear and completely online. Another huge plus was their compliance with the deadlines set.
Provided excellent purchase pricing, clear instructions, and quick payment for the Garmin watch I sold.  10/10 will sell my next device through them!

All interactions were great.  I did get worried about receiving my check though.  They said it would be there in about 5 business days, but it ended up coming in 9 business days.  But all turned out well in the end.

Great service provided. Evan and his team are truly honest and reach out to you in case of any confusion. I’ve gotten two deals with TechPayout and can’t wait for more. Really a legit and easy process to get $$ for your items.

Review.Titre: Searched the internet for sites that…
Review.Contenu: Searched the internet for sites that would take my practically new phone and give me a good price. So glad I came across this site,  they gave me way more than other sites had offered for my phone. I will gladly keep this company in mind for future phones, plus payment was quick! Thank you so much!
First time doing business with TechPayout and won't be my last. The process was very straightforward and I received my payment quickly. I highly recommend TechPayout .

TechPayout did everything they said they would do. They looked at my tablet quickly and sent me the amount that they said they would. I received payment very quickly as well. Overall, it was a very good experience with TechPayout.

Review.Titre: Really fast response and nice customer…
Review.Contenu: Really fast response and nice customer service. I didn’t get the check and got payment by PayPal in one day after I let them know. My Garmin watch was well valued.

The service I received was very professional and the turn around was flawless and expedient. I would recommend this service to anyone looking to trade in or sell their electronics to a trusted source.
Very easy transaction.  Fair price and shipped to TechPayout for free.  Received check quickly.  No problems/issues at all.
Easy, great transaction. Quick payment, I received payment for my item within a few days of it being received at TechPayout.
My expereicne was quite pleasamnt.  They qere qucik and attentive to my questions and gthey were fair regarding th sale of my old phone

Review.Titre: Finding this site was my greatest challenge.
Review.Contenu: Blazingly Simple. Follow the numbers 1, 2, 3..  Email notification as the item progresses within TechPayout and then, for me, 1.5 days later PayPal receipt from TechPayout.

This transaction was flawless. All you have to do is put your phone in a box, put the prepaid shipping label on it and send it off. I got exactly the quote I asked for the day after it arrived! It went straight into my paypal account. It only took about 5 days from the day I mailed the phone off until the day I got the money. Quick and easy!
Great company to work with. There was an issue but was my fault. Techpayout worked with me and the issue was resolved. Great experience!!
Sent in my phone via the prepaid UPS shipping label. Delivered at 10am on a Wednesday and had my money via PayPal by 7pm the same day. Thanks.
This site works, got my money for my index headset just like they said, pretty quickly actually.

Review.Titre: They were very prompt and professional…
Review.Contenu: They were very prompt and professional I will definitely be using them again to sell my old phones and things to.
I didn’t clear my phone properly and I was contacted immediately and given instructions on how to do so. Very responsive team, great customer service!
FAIR DEALINGS. HONEST TO WORK WITH. I AM A REPEAT CUSTOMER.
The quote and time to turn around payment after receipt was timel and met their commitment. The quote was accurate and fair.

Review.Titre: Worked just like it said it did .
Review.Contenu: Worked just like it said it did .. was simple, fast and efficient and definitely better than tossing the phone in the garbage .. thanks
Thank you techpayout. The process is easy and payments are very competitive. Will definitely come back
Amazing always amazingEven if your product is not on their site they will accommodate you
Great service. Very helpful with answering all my questions. Got my payment quick. Very good experience.
Very efficient process, and got the money quoted. I would definitely use TechPayout again and recommend to friends.
TechPayout service was great, provided a label to mail phone and my account by was credited quickly

We got in contact with this company regarding selling some used cell phones that we've had sitting around we describe what the phones were they offered us x amount of dollars we printed a shipping label send them up there in a week later we had a check excellent service thank you very much

Review.Titre: The best company by far once again you…
Review.Contenu: The best company by far once again you cannot go wrong with them i sponsor them 100% they have my business for life. they are there via email or phone.

Review.Titre: Payment was quick and exactly what was…
Review.Contenu: Payment was quick and exactly what was quoted. Payout was quite a bit more than other places. Very satisfied.

Review.Titre: Easy and quick transaction as always
Review.Contenu: Easy and quick transaction as always. TechPayOut is/will always be my go to for customers. Thanks
I had a great experience. Super friendly customer service and quick payouts! Keep up the great work!
Excellent service.  Prompt payment as promised.  Will do business again next time.

Review.Titre: I've dealt with TechPayout a few times…
Review.Contenu: I've dealt with TechPayout a few times and I find them to be very honest and fair.  They will offer the most amount possible for your devices.
They have never disappointed and their responses are prompt and educated. I only use them when I have a device to sell.
friendly and prompt customer service, and the fact that of the places I tried to sell my surface, they beat all the others by about $100.00...

Review.Titre: I was amazed at how quickly and…
Review.Contenu: I was amazed at how quickly and efficiently the process was!!!  I would highly recommend using TechPayout!

Review.Titre: After responding on the the main…
Review.Contenu: After responding on the the main website I was contacted very quickly and business was handled very swiftly.
Offered the highest amount that I found. Fast responses. Money went directly to PayPal account. Super easy. No issues at all.
Excellent service and turn around. I was most impressed that when I called, someone answered the phone timely and was able to answer my questions.  Thank You
Easy process. Quick payout. Highly recommend to get rid of your old technology.
Quicky and easy. I did a bit of research and this one paid the most for my old phone. I got an extra dollar for sending back the original box too.
Techpayout provided a quote which was higher than other sites. Payment was prompt and the price paid was the price quoted.
Great resource for decluttering your home.
This is my first time sell a very old phone. The team is really supportive. Nice service and fast payment. Strongly recommend!!!

Review.Titre: Always no problem with Tech Payout
Review.Contenu: Always no problem with Tech Payout. Fast payment. They honor their quotes.
Very smooth transaction and great communication with the company. Will sell to them again.
Excellent. By far the best service out there. Great customer service and fast payouts.

Review.Titre: This service is great Fast payment
Review.Contenu: This service is great. You won't find a better one. Pick up and delivery is fast and payouts are fast . They do what they say. No need to worry about getting paid. They use UPS. No delays.
The process was easy. I input my information and less than 7 days I had money in my account. Thank you so much.
